body_html:
The private method is sad because it can return wrong results if the optimizer is reused across many graphs (and, indeed, the optimizer itself is kinda wrong for that use-case).

I think we can make the slot API better by allowing variable-free slots (keyed by a graph, or, if None, the current default graph) and having Adam use those. Something called graph_slot, or free_slot?

The private method is sad because it can return wrong results if the optimizer is reused across many graphs (and, indeed, the optimizer itself is kinda wrong for that use-case).

I think we can make the slot API better by allowing variable-free slots (keyed by a graph, or, if None, the current default graph) and having Adam use those. Something called `graph_slot`, or `free_slot`?
